scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a wooden cross standing on a mound of earth, with the inscription 'INRI' visible at the top. The cross is rendered with a rough texture, suggesting it is made of wood. The mound beneath it is depicted with swirling lines, possibly representing rocks or soil. The entire image is framed by a decorative border featuring repeating geometric motifs and small architectural elements. The background consists of text, indicating this is an illustration from a manuscript.
